name: yoshino-yoi-boilerplate
description: Lightweight starter kit to create static websites with Yoi - the Yoshino frontend component library.
author: yoshino.digital dev team

scripts.postinstall: npm run yoi-update && npm run yoi-init && npm run build && npm run serve & npm run watch
scripts.copy: npm run copy-favicon && npm run copy-opengraph && npm run copy-download && npm run copy-images && npm run copy-scripts && npm run copy-fonts
scripts.yoi-init: npm run yoi-less && npm run yoi-js-index
scripts.yoi-less: npm run yoi-less-config && npm run yoi-less-index
scripts.yoi-less-index: npm run yoi-less-utilities-index && npm run yoi-less-components-index
scripts.yoi-js-index: npm run yoi-js-actions-index && npm run yoi-js-behaviours-index && npm run yoi-js-modules-index && npm run yoi-js-components-index
scripts.build: npm run dist-empty && npm run build-scripts && npm run build-styles && npm run build-templates && npm run copy
scripts.build-scripts: uglifyjs $(echo 'bower_components/yoshino-yoi/src/js/yoi.js' ; echo $(cat src/assets/js/yoi-*.index) ; echo $(find src/assets/js/theme -name '*.js' -exec echo '{}' \;)) --source-map-inline --beautify -o dist/$npm_package_config_distSubdir/assets/js/scripts.js
scripts.build-styles: npm run styles-compile --source-map-map-inline && npm run styles-process
scripts.publish: npm run dist-empty && npm run build-templates && npm run publish-scripts && npm run copy && npm run publish-styles
scripts.publish-scripts: uglifyjs $(echo 'bower_components/yoshino-yoi/src/js/yoi.js' ; echo $(cat src/assets/js/yoi-*.index) ; echo $(find src/assets/js/theme -name '*.js' -exec echo '{}' \;)) --compress -o dist/$npm_package_config_distSubdir/assets/js/scripts.js
scripts.publish-styles: npm run styles-compile && npm run styles-process && npm run styles-reduce && npm run styles-compress
scripts.watch: npm run watch-fonts & npm run watch-images & npm run watch-scripts & npm run watch-styles & npm run watch-templates
scripts.serve: browser-sync start --server dist --files dist --startPath $npm_package_config_distSubdir --cors --no-notify & npm run watch
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run serve
